Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People worldwide are taking to social media to address Australia's 2023-24 Budget. The new budget addresses multiple aspects including improving superannuation and emergency communications systems. Furthermore experts express concerns towards the adequacy of JobSeeker and other payment systems with many struggling financially without food medication or a roof over their head. As such organizations urge for the raising of rates to $76 a day allowing recipients to cover the basics.
